body.name: Y&M Nightstand, 1PC 2-Tier Side Table with Drawer, Modern Bedside Table Night Stand Storage Shelf for Small Spaces, Bedroom, Living Room, Wooden Accent Table with Metal Frame - Gray and Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 4 mins
features: 🏠【Bed Side Table/Night Stand with Storage】23.4 inches in height which is ideal for beds with a height of 16 to 25 inches. It fits in many locations throughout your home and also can be used as an end table next to a sofa, as a side table in the living room, or as toy storage in the nursery.

🏠【Perfect Storage Space】Designed with a smooth drawer and metal shelf which is the perfect combination of openness and secrecy can help you organize various items. There are 1.3 inches of anti-drop baffles on the left, right, and back of the desktop to prevent electronic products from falling when you use them. The bottom shelf is open storage and comes with a non-woven basket, on which you can place 15 lbs of magazines, books, or a variety of other items.

🏠【Sturdy Construction】The anti-rust square tube frame and textured particle MDF board give this side table an individual character and remarkable stability. Also equipped with 4 adjustable feet can protect your floor from scratches and enhance stability on uneven surfaces efficiently.

🏠【Multifunctional】Works great in holding remotes, laptops, phones, and books next to the couch, chair, recliner, or beside the bed as a nightstand. It is also very suitable for placing in the narrow space on both sides of the sofa. Great for living room, bedroom, home, office, and small spaces.

🏠【Easy to Assemble】The side table is simple in structure and comes with easy-to-follow instructions and numbered accessories. Tighten the screws in position and the assembly is done. Product dimensions: 16.5"L x 11.8"W x 23.4"H.

Folding Basket It has a folding basket for the bottom shelf to store your magazines, books, plant, and toys. Sturdy & Heavy Duty Made of dense metal mesh plate, it is durable and can be used for a long time without worrying about the bottom plate collapsing and breaking.

Mid Century Nightstand for Bedrooms Used as a bedside table, slim nightstand, perfect size for the corner of your bedroom for displaying cellphone, iPad, clock, lamp, candles, photos and other things. Practical Sofa Side Tables for Living Room The perfect size and height match most sofa and chairs making it ideal to use as a chairside table, sofa table, mini coffee table, reading table, tea table, snack table, etc. Modern End Tables for Lounge Not only for a lazy night, but it’s also ideal as an end table in your reading nook, offering a cozy perch for your coffee, books, pens, as well as your big and small ideas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was so nice especially for the money. I wanted a bedside table for our Guest Bedroom. It was not hard to assemble and it looks so nice in the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but cute!
reviews.reviewText: Yes, it’s small but it’s nice looking, easy to put together & serves its purpose! Great purchase for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice but didn't need it.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this on a coupon deal and was super excited to get it! I opened it right away when it got here and realized what I ordered was WAY TO SMALL!!! It is perfect for a little corner and the quality seemed nice for what I paid. If you need a cute little storage piece for a small apartment, this is perfect for you.I ended up returning it because I didn't need the piece, but it is very cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm not a rocket scientist!
reviews.reviewText: The first time I've bought anything that I've had to assemble, that the instructions were Flawless! I actually enjoyed assembling the table and Everything was labeled/marked that even a Non mechanical person such as myself, had No problems. Everything was clear and provided in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product For The Price
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice little nightstand/end table, and it is small. It comes unassembled but all tools necessary to put it together are included; it took me 30 min to put it together, and that includes the time it took to take the stickers off all visible areas. The instructions are almost foolproof; there is one step where if you don’t look carefully at the illustration you will put board 3 on upside down. Assembly is almost completely done using a hex wrench. The grey and black color is nice and blends in well with my decor. The drawer opens and closes surprisingly smoothly and the entire unit is very sturdy. It weighs about 15 lbs and is 23” high by 16-1/2” wide by 12” deep, perfect size for a night table or an end table. Originally I was going to use it as an end table for the couch in my office, but it is the perfect size to fit under my desk and will give me a place to charge my laptop that is out of the way, plus giving me a drawer for ’stuff’, something I do not have now.One con on this item: it is made from “MDF” but not what I usually associate MDF with. It looks like large wood fibers were glued together and then a laminate but on the board. When you are putting it together you will hear a sickening ‘crunch’ as you drive in the screws and it is easy to strip the hole if you are not careful (so do all by hand). My other concern for this wood is, in the past, I have seen it suck up water if it gets in contact with it and fall apart. I don’t know if this will happen here; luckily no wood touches the ground but I would not place this in a damp environment.Overall, I give this 4 stars; as long as you understand what you are getting it is a good deal, since I have seen tables like this go for a lot more that were not as nice.
